OPERATIONS 
OPERATIONS OPERATIONS 
LIEUTENANT LIEUTENANT LIEUTENANT 
A staff member must observe all initiates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative 
deter' ion or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 
a.m. —  12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 
12:30 am —  1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate Is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be 
conducted on an irregular schedule and no snore than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be 
documented. 
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH 
LIEUTENANT  
CAPTAIN 
EFTA00009767
